I have an itchy rash that started about 3 months ago and it has been spreading.
Where exactly is the rash located on your body?
The rash is located on my wrists, hands, elbows, ankles, and feet.

No, I haven't noticed any changes in the rash after eating specific foods or during certain activities.

I have no known allergies and have not changed my skin care products or medications.

The rash has dark purple and gray flat-topped bumps with fine gray-white streaks.

No, I have not experienced any other symptoms alongside the rash.
Final Diagnosis: Lichen Planus.
